sentences.en: As he came closer he saw a gigantic wall of raging flame before him.
sentences.cn: 他走近时发现前面是一道烈火熊熊的巨大火墙。

sentences.en: He has a gigantic appetite and eats gigantic meal.
sentences.cn: 他饭量特别大,吃得惊人的多.

sentences.en: He has a gigantic appetite and eats gigantic meals.
sentences.cn: 他有很大的食量,能吃很多的食物.

sentences.en: He stands firmly at the top of a gigantic rock gazing afar.
sentences.cn: 他正一动不动地站在这悬空巨石的顶端,凝着神,敛着翅.

sentences.en: He was not to be daunted by the most gigantic word in the dictionary.
sentences.cn: 词典上最长的词也难不倒他.

sentences.en: Holmes slowly reopened his eyes and looked impatiently at his gigantic client.
sentences.cn: 福尔摩斯慢条斯理地重新张开双眼不耐烦地瞧着他那身躯魁伟的委托人.

sentences.en: It was to be a picnic on a gigantic scale.
sentences.cn: 这将是一次规模盛大的野游.

sentences.en: Some physicists have gone so far as to suggest that the entire Universe is a sort of gigantic computer.
sentences.cn: 一些物理学家竟然提出整个宇宙就像一台巨型计算机。

sentences.en: The company has made gigantic losses this year, and will probably go out of business.
sentences.cn: 该公司今年亏损巨大, 有可能倒闭.

sentences.en: The earth may be thought of as a gigantic magnet.
sentences.cn: 整个地球可以想像为一块硕大无朋的磁石.

sentences.en: The gigantic natural harbour of Poole is a haven for boats.
sentences.cn: 巨型天然港普尔港是船只的避风港。

sentences.en: The monument consists of a circle of gigantic stones.
sentences.cn: 纪念碑由一圈巨石组成。

sentences.en: The project is on such a gigantic scale that the cost is hard to calculate.
What could be the explanation of this gigantic piece of luck?
sentences.cn: 这么大的数目总要有个说法吧?

words.tran_cn: 巨大；[内科] 巨人症；巨大畸形

trans.tran_cn: 巨大的，庞大的，巨人似的，硕大无比，排山倒海
